5917.verse: وَمَا|And not|72|86|46$نَقَمُواْ|they resented|113|141|7756$مِنْهُمْ|[of] them|83|111|730$إِلَّآ|except|65|93|86$أَن|that|48|76|655$يُؤْمِنُواْ|they believed|109|137|727$بِٱللَّهِ|in Allah|67|81|79$ٱلْعَزِيزِ|the All-Mighty,|118|333|3257$ٱلْحَمِيدِ|the Praiseworthy,|137|352|9514$

5918.verse: ٱلَّذِى|The One Who,|115|123|138$لَهُۥ|for Him|66|83|977$مُلْكُ|(is) the dominion|131|148|1005$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|149|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۚ|and the earth;|117|134|352$وَٱللَّهُ|and Allah|80|88|167$عَلَىٰ|on|63|126|52$كُلِّ|every|57|183|185$شَىْءٍ|thing|69|195|186$شَهِيدٌ|(is) a Witness.|117|180|2562$

5919.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|80|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|108|20$فَتَنُواْ|persecuted|94|113|18007$ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|the believing men|136|155|1964$وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ|and the believing women,|189|208|7744$ثُمَّ|then|50|60|293$لَمْ|not|42|55|63$يَتُوبُواْ|they repented,|119|144|7758$فَلَهُمْ|then for them|111|136|623$عَذَابُ|(is) the punishment|149|174|5574$جَهَنَّمَ|(of) Hell|73|98|2655$وَلَهُمْ|and for them|105|118|71$عَذَابُ|(is the) punishment|149|332|5574$ٱلْحَرِيقِ|(of) the Burning Fire.|159|342|3559$

5920.verse: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|86|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|121|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believe|82|114|84$وَعَمِلُواْ|and do|92|124|238$ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ|the righteous deeds,|157|189|239$لَهُمْ|for them|76|92|98$جَنَّـٰتٌ|(will be) Gardens|131|137|2685$تَجْرِى|flow|81|94|242$مِن|from|50|62|53$تَحْتِهَا|underneath it|109|122|243$ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ‌ۚ|the rivers.|88|100|244$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|76|28$ٱلْفَوْزُ|(is) the success|127|133|3793$ٱلْكَبِيرُ|the great.|87|87|9356$

5928.verse: bali⚓Nay!⚓RET|LEM:bal★{l~a*iyna⚓Those who⚓ REL|LEM:{l~a*iY|MP★kafaruwA@⚓disbelieve⚓ V|PERF|LEM:kafara|ROOT:kfr|3MP★fiY⚓(are) in⚓ P|LEM:fiY★tako*iybK⚓denial.⚓ N|VN|(II)|LEM:tako*iyb|ROOT:k*b|M|INDEF|GEN★

5910.verse: By the sky containing great stars

5912.verse: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,

5913.verse: Cursed were the companions of the trench

5915.verse: When they were sitting near it

5916.verse: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.

5917.verse: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,

5918.verse: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.

5919.verse: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.

5920.verse: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.

5921.verse: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.

5922.verse: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.

5923.verse: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,

5926.verse: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -

5928.verse: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,

5929.verse: While Allah encompasses them from behind.

5930.verse: But this is an honored Qur'an
